welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Blaricum, a charming and picturesque city known for its beautiful landscapes and rich cultural heritage. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in all that our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The largest and busiest terminal at Schiphol Airport, serving both international and domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal primarily used for European and domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: A recently renovated terminal mainly used by KLM and its partner airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: A modern terminal serving mostly international flights, including those operated by low-cost carriers.

terminals.name: Terminal 5
terminals.description: The newest terminal at Schiphol Airport, primarily used by SkyTeam alliance airlines.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the WiFi network for free for up to 4 hours.
